sourcesContent:
import { useState, memo } from "react"
import { Button, Drawer, DrawerContent, DrawerOverlay, DrawerHeader, DrawerBody, useDisclosure, Box, Text, List, ListItem, Divider } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import { RiMenuFoldLine } from "react-icons/ri";

const MenuBar = memo(() => {
    const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
    return (
        <>
            <Box w='70px' h='70px' cursor='pointer'>
                <Text letterSpacing='1px' fontWeight='600' mb='-5px' fontSize='15px'>MENU</Text>
                <RiMenuFoldLine onClick={onOpen} size='50px' />
            </Box>
            <Drawer placement='right' onClose={onClose} isOpen={isOpen}>
                <DrawerOverlay />
                <DrawerContent>
                <DrawerHeader borderBottomWidth="1px">MENU</DrawerHeader>
                <DrawerBody p='0'>
                    <List>
                    <ListItem w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{background: 'rgba(256,256,256,.75)'}}>Top</ListItem>
                    <Divider />
                    <ListItem w="100%" p='16px 24px'>ユーザ一覧</ListItem>
                    <Divider />
                    <ListItem w="100%" p='16px 24px'>設定</ListItem>
                    </List>
                </DrawerBody>
                </DrawerContent>
            </Drawer>
        </>
    )
})

export default MenuBar
